trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies access capabilities and restrictions for a memory-mapped file or view.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxx x xxxxxx$xxxxxx xxxx xx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Read and write access to the file, with the restriction that any write operations will not be seen by other processes.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxx$ xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xx xxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Read access to the file that can store and run executable code.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Read and write access to the file.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
